subcategory.name: Notifications
subcategory.description: Pop-up notification and toast examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS notification and toast components to add non-intrusive alerts for user notifications to your application, featuring action and dismiss buttons, avatars, and icons. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
